sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
patters on a surface
, pada na to površino in pri tem povzroča kratke, ne preveč glasne zvoke.

seg.quote: Spots of rain pattered on the window.
I heard her feet pattering about upstairs.
They heard a patter of paws as the dog came to meet them.

sense.def:
The patter of an entertainer or salesman
so besede, ki se jih nastopajoči ali prodajalec nauči na pamet in jih nato zdrdra pred ljudmi.

seg.quote: He gave the usual patter about watertight boxes.
